name: popular
description: 网易立马理财运营推广项目

scripts.build: bower prune -s --allow-root && bower update -s --allow-root && miaow -c miaow.local.js
scripts.start: bower prune -s --allow-root && bower update -s --allow-root && miaow -c miaow.local.js -w
scripts.set-loglevel: npm config set loglevel error && cnpm config set loglevel error
scripts.release: npm run set-loglevel && npm install --no-optional -s --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org && rm -rf ./src/.remote && bower install -s --allow-root && miaow -e production
scripts.test: npm run set-loglevel && npm install --no-optional -s --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org && rm -rf ./src/.remote && bower install -s --allow-root && miaow -e test
